entry.title: ThaddeusB: +1 for MP balance
entry.summary:
+1 for MP balance

← Previous revision Revision as of 14:25, 30 March 2013
Line 12: Line 12:
 
{{*mp|March 24}} Rebels '''[[Central African Republic conflict (2012–present)#Fall of Bangui|capture]]''' [[Bangui]], the capital of the [[Central African Republic]], as President [[François Bozizé]] ''(pictured)'' flees the country.
  
{{*mp|March 24}} Rebels '''[[Central African Republic conflict (2012–present)#Fall of Bangui|capture]]''' [[Bangui]], the capital of the [[Central African Republic]], as President [[François Bozizé]] ''(pictured)'' flees the country.
 
{{*mp|March 20}} The [[2013 World Baseball Classic|World Baseball Classic]] concludes with the [[Dominican Republic national baseball team|Dominican Republic]] '''[[2013 World Baseball Classic – Championship|defeating]]''' [[Puerto Rico national baseball team|Puerto Rico]] in the final.
  
{{*mp|March 20}} The [[2013 World Baseball Classic|World Baseball Classic]] concludes with the [[Dominican Republic national baseball team|Dominican Republic]] '''[[2013 World Baseball Classic – Championship|defeating]]''' [[Puerto Rico national baseball team|Puerto Rico]] in the final.
  +
{{*mp|March 20}} [[President of Bangladesh|Bangladeshi President]] '''[[Zillur Rahman]]''' dies in a Singapore hospital at the age of 84.
   
 
</ul>
  
</ul>
